ing: 1 (15 ounce) can mandarin oranges, drained with liquid reserved
n: Mandarin Orange, Cilantro, and Avocado Salsa
des: "My sister made the original version of this recipe, but I tweaked it to make it my own. It is very easy to prepare and makes a delicious and pretty addition to any party. Perfect for the summer!"
ins: Mix avocados, red onion, mandarin oranges, cilantro, and lime juice together in a bowl. Stir enough reserved mandarin orange juice to coat the avocado mixture.
